Class SimHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimHost

  •  class SimHost
extends java.lang.Object
    class SimHost simulates an end device

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SimHost.NlReceive
      class NlReceive receives a packet by converting a frame received from data link layer
      private class  SimHost.NlSend
      class NlSend takes input from command line in IP:MESSAGE format, converts the message into a packet and sends the packet to data link layer

      • loadParameters

        public void loadParameters(java.lang.String deviceId)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        reads configurations of end devices; and connections among end devices, routers and switches
        Parameters:
        deviceId - string representation of the device, Hn for end devices, Rn for routers, Sn for switches; n being 1,2,3,...
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadArpTable

        public void loadArpTable()
                  throws java.lang.Exception

        java.lang.Exception
